name: Destroy Them Roids!!!
description:
INCOMING ASTEROIDS ARE HEADING TOWARDS PLANET EARTH! HUMANITY IS DOOMED! But hey, you may as well try to delay the inevitable.

Controls: Use the mouse to shoot asteroids.

Made in 10 hours spread over 5 days for the Apocalypse Jam, with the them of the END OF THE WORLD! https://itch.io/jam/apocalypse-jam-2022 

I used a font called Somerset Barnyard by Chequered Ink, and used music by FoxSenergy. My friend StarryPen coded the screenshake. Everything else is all me!

I went for a cardboard paper aesthetic, and I think it looks nice.  It could be a bit more polished, but I'm tired and this is only my 2nd finished game, so it doesn't have to be perfect.
